title: verify_dynamic_calculator_navigation
description: Test that the user can navigate and open calculators through the dynamic dropdown menu on the home page without errors.

title: validate_theme_upload_and_activation
description: Test the theme upload process including validation checks, activation, and ensure dynamic CSS is applied correctly on the front end.

title: plugin_upload_and_activation_toggle
description: Test uploading new plugins, validate their manifests, toggle activation status, and ensure no system errors occur.

title: backup_creation_and_restore_functionality
description: Test creating full system backups including database and theme/plugin data, restoring from backups, and verify system state is accurately restored.

title: audit_log_filter_and_download
description: Test the audit log viewer's filtering capabilities and the ability to download selected log entries without data corruption.

title: admin_post_routes_security
description: Test that all administrative POST routes enforce rate limiting and CSRF protection to prevent unauthorized or excessive requests.

title: structured_logging_verification
description: Test that system logs and audit logs are structured correctly and include all necessary events for auditing purposes.

title: api_health_endpoint_response
description: Test the /api/v1/health endpoint to ensure it returns a 200 OK status with the correct JSON response indicating system availability.
